description: This file is the main route component for a personal notes web application built with Qwik. It manages state for notes, user authentication, filtering, and UI interactions, and composes core components like Sidebar, NoteList, NoteEditor, and AuthBar. It also includes logic for fetching notes and user data, handling authentication, and updating the interface accordingly.

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Performs side-effect tasks on component setup, such as fetching data.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped styles from CSS modules to the component.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates a reactive store object for managing component state.
Wraps functions for Qwik's reactive invocation.
